thread.title: Olympics-Short Track-Men's 1500m heats results

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Olympics-Short Track-Men's 1500m heats results
text: Feb 10 (Gracenote) - Olympic short track men's 1500m heats results in Pyeongchang on Saturday. Time Heat 1 1. Sandor Liu Shaolin (Hungary) 2 minutes 12.835 seconds Q 2. Samuel Girard (Canada) 2:12.923 Q 3. Semion Elistratov (Olympic Athlete from Russia) 2:13.087 Q 4. Hiroki Yokoyama (Japan) 2:13.323 5. Ward Petre (Belgium) 2:17.362 6. Farrell Treacy (Britain) Heat 2 1. Charles Hamelin (Canada) 2:12.130 Q 2. Jens Almey (Belgium) 2:12.998 Q 3. Aaron Tran (U.S.) 2:14.133 Q 4. Andy Jung (Australia) 2:16.995ADV 5.
